derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: from French, via late Latin from Greek papas

entry.def: Some people refer to or address their father as papa .

example.ex: He was so much older than me, older even than my papa.
example.tran: 他比我大很多，甚至比我爸爸还大。

means.word_mean: 1. an informal term for a father; probably derived from baby talk
